title: Mango, ginger and chilli chicken
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 mango, cut into chunks', '1 small green chilli, deseeded and chopped', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped root ginger', '1 small onion, chopped', '1/2 tin coconut milk', '1 mug rice']
